name: Oceanotitan
overview: Oceanotitan is a genus of sauropod dinosaur known from the Upper Jurassic Lourinh√£ Formation of Portugal. It is represented by a single specimen consisting of several tail vertebrae and appendicular bones. It contains one species, Oceanotitan dantasi. Oceanotitan is classified as possibly one of the earliest members of the Somphospondyli, a group of sauropods that includes the titanosaurs.
